Package xxl.core.util.timers

This package contains different implementations of the Timer interface as well as some useful static methods for dealing with timers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Timer The timer interface is the base of efficient timers which are based on Ticks as smallest units.
 

Class Summary
JavaTimer Implements the Timer interface based on java.lang.System.currentTimeMillis.
JNITimer This is a timer which uses a native library to implement the Timer interface.
StopWatch This class provides a simple to use stop watch.
TimerUtils This class contains some static methods which are very useful when dealing with timers.
 

Package xxl.core.util.timers Description

This package contains different implementations of the Timer interface as well as some useful static methods for dealing with timers.
